argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | latjcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | latjcl.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( meet ` K ) = ( meet ` K ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_latlem | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .\/ Y ) e. B /\ ( X ( meet ` K ) Y ) e. B ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) |
